title: Forgemaster Ornn mission currently not registering stats
body:
Hello, currently the victories/ items crafted and redirected rams are not registering toward the mission.

Thanks,
Just Ornn

replies.body: According to the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) and the updates on the client itself, it looks like Missions are currently having some issues and the devs are already working on a fix.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QwhhZraj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-23T21:14:46.167+0000)
>
> According to the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) and the updates on the client itself, it looks like Missions are currently having some issues and the devs are already working on a fix.

Should I put in a ticket?
Is there an official thread to post in that is monitoring the actual issue?
Its been 2 weeks since OP and i havent seen anything about it.

1. Do only items Ornn forges count or does it count other team members upgrades?
2. Should we just keep grinding it out and try and stat track ourselves?
I know some people dont have time to smash out X amount of games daily and the quest ends in a week.

Thank you!  This is the same thing I just came here to ask about.  I did two games with Ornn, forged a bunch of stuff, and yet no update on the mission.

Is it broken?
